sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"视力，视觉"之意。
means: vision ： 书面用词，含义广泛，指人的视力或视野，也可指远见卓识。
eyesight ： 普通用词，指眼睛的正常功能。
sight ： 普通用词，与eyesight同义，可换用，指由实实在在的事物引起的视觉。
perception ： 指视觉，也可泛指其它器官的功能，或引申指敏锐的理解力。

sentence.Network_en: He was not a particularly good shot because of his eyesight.
sentence.Network_cn: 他视力不好，算不上是一个出色的射手。

sentence.Network_en: Until the beating, Cantanco's eyesight had been weak, but adequate.
sentence.Network_cn: 挨打前坎坦科的视力就一直很弱，不过也还勉强看得见。

sentence.Network_en: Her ambition to become an artist was thwarted by failing eyesight.
sentence.Network_cn: 她想成为艺术家的梦想由于视力衰减而破灭了。

entry.def: Your eyesight is your ability to see.

example.ex: He suffered from poor eyesight and could no longer read properly.
example.tran: 他视力不好，再也不能正常阅读了。

means.word_mean: 1. normal use of the faculty of vision

auth_sentence.content: Not when you've lost your toes and eyesight.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not when you've lost your toes and eyesight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not when you've lost your toes and eyesight.

auth_sentence.content: Toward the end, she began to lose her eyesight.
auth_sentence.res_content: Toward the end, she began to lose her eyesight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Toward the end, she began to lose her eyesight.

auth_sentence.content: His eyesight has drastically deteriorated as a result.
auth_sentence.res_content: His eyesight has drastically deteriorated as a result.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His eyesight has drastically deteriorated as a result.

Sentence.sentence: There are many commonly held beliefs about eye glasses and eyesight that are not proven facts.
We have all heard some of the common myths about how eyesight gets bad
However, although eyestrain may cause some pain or headaches, it does not permanently damage eyesight.

sentences.en: Her eyesight grew so bad that she could hardly see.
sentences.cn: 她的视力变得很糟, 几乎什么也看不见了。
